## Version Bump Required
**Important**: Please add the appropriate version label to this PR:

- `version:major` - Breaking changes (1.0.0 â†’ 2.0.0)
- `version:minor` - New features, backward compatible (1.0.0 â†’ 1.1.0)
- `version:patch` - Bug fixes, small improvements (1.0.0 â†’ 1.0.1)
- `version:skip` - No version bump (documentation, tests, etc.)

**Default**: If no version label is added, a patch bump will be automatically applied.

## Testing
- [ ] Unit tests pass
- [ ] E2E tests pass
- [ ] Manual testing completed
- [ ] New tests added (if applicable)

## Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation (if applicable)
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published
